title: A January Dandelion - the role of the dandelion

content.prompt: Which best describes the role of the dandelion in the poem?

choices.label: It presents a contrast to the harshness of human experience.
It represents the poetâ€™s long-standing love of nature.
It signals the promise of new beginnings.
It provides an occasion for reflection on lost love.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
